mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction_make_order_tab (orderNo, paymentType, currencyId, currencyName, currencyNumber, currencyTotalPrice, backerAccount, ipAddress, executeStatus, remark, executeTime, addTime) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{paymentType}, #{currencyId}, #{currencyName}, #{currencyNumber}, #{currencyTotalPrice}, #{backerAccount}, #{ipAddress}, #{executeStatus}, #{remark}, #{executeTime}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: SELECT orderNo, paymentType, currencyId, currencyName, currencyNumber, currencyTotalPrice, backerAccount, ipAddress, executeStatus, remark, executeTime, addTime FROM transaction_make_order_tab WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo}
